statements: UPDATE ResearchProjects SET researcher_name='John Doe', project_name='Project A' WHERE project_id=1;

UPDATE researchers SET ethical_adherence_score = 8 WHERE researcher_id = 101;
UPDATE researchers SET research_project_title = 'New Project' WHERE researcher_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE researchers SET ethical_adherence_score = 90, researcher_name = 'Alice' WHERE researcher_id = 1;

UPDATE research_projects SET ethical_guidelines = 'Updated ethical guidelines' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE researcher SET institution = 'New Institution', research_area = 'Updated Research Area' WHERE researcher_id = 2;

UPDATE researcher SET institution = 'Updated Institution B', research_area = 'Updated Research Area B' WHERE researcher_id = 5;

UPDATE research_projects SET adherence_to_ethical_guidelines = TRUE WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE project_ethical_checks SET adherence_status = FALSE WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND guideline_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174003';
